notes: base lemma; can mean pickup, withdrawal, or retreat

example_sentence_italian: Ho prenotato un ritiro per i mobili.
example_sentence_english: I booked a pickup for the furniture.
The pickup will start at eight.
We are going to the pickup.
I will call the scheduled pickups.

example_sentence_italian: Vengo dal ritiro con i pacchi.
example_sentence_english: I am coming from the pickup with the packages.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono molti pacchi nel ritiro.
example_sentence_english: There are many packages in the pickup.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una nota sul ritiro.
example_sentence_english: I read a note about the pickup.
I have data about local pickups.

example_sentence_italian: Collaboro col ritiro per la consegna.
example_sentence_english: I collaborate with the pickup for the delivery.
We work with the downtown pickups.
